short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Offset carbon emissions for every Uber ride you've taken.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: RideNeutral allows you to calculate your total CO2 emissions from every ride share ride you've taken and offset your personal carbon emissions. You can also see data on how much you've spent on ride shares over the past decade, your total rides, and the percentage of rides that are pools.
